page.title: 10LIFE STYLES - FASHION
page.content: Jumpers in fashion are dolman sleeved ones.The sleeves on them start at the ribs and slope upwards till they join the cuffs. Also bat-winged sweaters are in fashion.They're sleeves start at the bottom of the jumper and slope up to the cuff to give a 'winged' effect. Suits in fashion are boiler suits.They have a top and trousers all joined together. Zipped trousers are in fashion.They are trousers which have zips all over them.Ski-pants and baggy trousers are in fashion while tight jeans,known as 'drainpipes' are going out. Jackets in fashion are Donkey Jackets.They are quite long,and black with big pockets.Denim jackets are also in fashion.They are short with elasticated waists.
